text:
Hello,
i'm writing an integration and want to redirect my users back to their HubSpot portal.
How can i get the subdomain prefix of a certain portal?
In my test cases i have urls starting with just `<http://app.HubSpot.com|app.HubSpot.com>` but also `<http://app-eu1.HubSpot.com|app-eu1.HubSpot.com>`  â€¦ i guess there is an `<http://app-us1.HubSpot.com|app-us1.HubSpot.com>` aswell.
Is there a way to get this info via the oauth api?
Or i think the best way would be, if i could just linkt to `<http://app.HubSpot.com|app.HubSpot.com>` and HubSpot itselfs redirects to the correct subdomain.

Hi everyone, hoping to get some help.  I've done the let work to get create a custom timeline event, got all the way through it and I get a success notification with an id.  I can query the ID and get back the response, but when I go into the CRM UI, the event is not showing on the user's feed.  What am I missing?
Neeeevermind, there was a blatantly obvious box I needed to check.  Heh.
